description.value: Glass bottle with glass stopper for 'Cholera Drops' with traces of original contents remaining. 117 mm x 37 mm x 45 mm, 173g. Label reads, 'Cholera Drops/ A teaspoonful in a little/ water and repeat in an/ hour if required.' Bottle is dated to the 19th of August 1864. Dispensed by Decastro and Watson Chemists, English, 1864.

note.value:
This object has not been taken from its current location to Medical Galleries preparation area (B; G44) due to its associated hazard (potential PCB leak). Further advice and Hazard record update needed before movign the object. [Kai, Mayuko 2016-02-17].
Deemed unlikely to be PCB leak. Object contains mineral motor oil for luberication of the pump mechanism. Sump has been drained - see conservation field [Stephens, Simon 2017-11-24].
